thread.title: ZMDI, a global semiconductor company, is pleased to announce its attendance and exhibition at the Qualcomm® 3G/LTE Summit in Hong Kong on September 14-16, 2015
thread.title_full: ZMDI, a global semiconductor company, is pleased to announce its attendance and exhibition at the Qualcomm® 3G/LTE Summit in Hong Kong on September 14-16, 2015

author: prbuzz.com
title: ZMDI, a global semiconductor company, is pleased to announce its attendance and exhibition at the Qualcomm® 3G/LTE Summit in Hong Kong on September 14-16, 2015
text:
ZMDI Dresden, Germany – ZMD AG (ZMDI), an award-winning global semiconductor company headquartered in Dresden, Germany, specializing in enabling energy-efficient solutions, today announces its attendance at the Qualcomm® 3G/LTE Summit in Hong Kong. As a global supplier of analog and mixed-signal solutions for automotive, industrial, medical, information technology and consumer applications, ZMDI is proud to be representing its Mobile Sensing product division at this event on September 14-16, 2015.
The Qualcomm® 3G/LTE Summit connects an increasing number of worldwide leaders in the manufacturing, operating and component technology industries for a one-of-a-kind networking and information gathering event. ZMDI is the global leader in mobile environmental sensing with solutions being demonstrated at the conference for UV/optical, barometric pressure, humidity, thermopile and gas sensing applications. Smart phone and wearable product development companies now have the ability to release innovative solutions rapidly with Qualcomm’s Snapdragon™ platform microprocessors and ZMDI’s environmental sensing solutions.
“ZMDI is proud to be a part of this wonderful event in Hong Kong again this year, and we look forward to demonstrating our tremendously innovative environmental sensing solutions at the event. Qualcomm is to be applauded for their commitment in the area of technology and their outstanding initiative in organizing the Qualcomm® 3G/LTE Summit,” states David Simpson, ZMDI Mobile Sensing Business Development Manager.
More information on the event can be found at https://3gltesummit.qualcomm.com/about .
About ZMDI
Zentrum Mikroelektronik Dresden AG (ZMDI) is a global supplier of analog and mixed-signal semiconductor solutions for automotive, industrial, medical, mobile sensing, information technology and consumer applications. These solutions enable our customers to create the most energy-efficient products in multi-market and mobile sensing, power management and battery management.
For over 50 years, ZMDI has been globally headquartered in Dresden, Germany. ZMDI serves its customers with sales offices and design centers throughout Germany, Italy, Bulgaria, Japan, Korea, China, Taiwan and the United States: www.zmdi.com/zmdi-offices . Our customers are also supported through an expansive channel of distribution partners and representatives throughout the world: www.zmdi.com/distribution-partners-reps .
See more at zmdi.com .
